verses.verse: וַיֹּסִ֙פוּ֙ <WH3254> vai-yo-Si-fu again בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot did הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> ha-Ra' evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD וְאֵה֖וּד <WH164> ve-'e-Hud when Ehud מֵֽת׃ <WH4191> Met. was dead

וַיִּמְכְּרֵ֣ם <WH4376> vai-yim-ke-Rem sold יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> be-Yad them into the hand יָבִ֣ין <WH2985> ya-Vin of Jabin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- king כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an, of Canaan אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> ma-Lach that reigned בְּחָצ֑וֹר <WH2674> be-cha-Tzor; in Hazor וְשַׂר־ <WH8269> ve-sar- the captain צְבָאוֹ֙ <WH6635> tze-va-'O of whose host סִֽיסְרָ֔א <WH5516> sis-Ra, [was] Sisera וְה֥וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu he יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> yo-Shev which dwelt בַּחֲרֹ֥שֶׁת <WH2800> ba-cha-Ro-shet in Harosheth הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> hag-go-Yim. of the Gentiles

וַיִּצְעֲק֥וּ <WH6817> vai-yitz-'a-Ku cried בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; unto the LORD כִּ֠י <WH3588> ki for תְּשַׁ֨ע <WH8672> te-Sha' for he had nine מֵא֤וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred רֶֽכֶב־ <WH7393> re-chev- chariots בַּרְזֶל֙ <WH1270> bar-Zel of iron ל֔וֹ lo, וְ֠הוּא <WH1931> Ve-hu and he לָחַ֞ץ <WH3905> la-Chatz oppressed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּנֵ֧י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בְּחָזְקָ֖ה <WH2394> be-cha-ze-Kah he mightily עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim and twenty שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> sha-Nah. years ס sa-Mek

וּדְבוֹרָה֙ <WH1683> u-de-vo-Rah And Deborah אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah the wife נְבִיאָ֔ה <WH5031> ne-vi-'Ah, a prophetess אֵ֖שֶׁת <WH802> 'E-shet the wife לַפִּיד֑וֹת <WH3941> lap-pi-Dot; of Lapidoth הִ֛יא <WH1931> hi he שֹׁפְטָ֥ה <WH8199> sho-fe-Tah she judged אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El Israel בָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> ba-'Et at that time הַהִֽיא׃ <WH1931> ha-Hi. he

וְ֠הִיא <WH1931> Ve-hi he יוֹשֶׁ֨בֶת <WH3427> yo-She-vet And she dwelt תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> ta-chat- under תֹּ֜מֶר <WH8560> To-mer under the palm tree דְּבוֹרָ֗ה <WH1683> de-vo-Rah, of Deborah בֵּ֧ין <WH996> bein between הָרָמָ֛ה <WH7414> ha-ra-Mah between Ramah וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> u-Vein between בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֖ל <WH1008> 'el and Bethel בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> be-Har in mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim; Ephraim וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> vai-ya-'a-Lu came up אֵלֶ֛יהָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-ha and to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לַמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> lam-mish-Pat. to her for judgment

וַתִּשְׁלַ֗ח <WH7971> vat-tish-Lach, And she sent וַתִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> vat-tik-Ra and called לְבָרָ֣ק <WH1301> le-va-Rak Barak בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֲבִינֹ֔עַם <WH42> 'a-vi-No-'am, of Abinoam מִקֶּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6943> mik-Ke-desh out of Kedeshnaphtali נַפְתָּלִ֑י <WH5321> naf-ta-Li; of Naphtali וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vat-To-mer and said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> 'e-Lav to him הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> ha-Lo Behold צִוָּ֣ה׀ <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto him Hath not the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei- God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> lech Go וּמָֽשַׁכְתָּ֙ <WH4900> u-ma-shach-Ta and draw בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> be-Har toward mount תָּב֔וֹר <WH8396> ta-Vor, Tabor וְלָקַחְתָּ֣ <WH3947> ve-la-kach-Ta and take עִמְּךָ֗ <WH5973> 'im-me-Cha, you עֲשֶׂ֤רֶת <WH6235> 'a-Se-ret with thee ten אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> 'a-la-Fim thousand אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish, men מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> mib-be-Nei of the children נַפְתָּלִ֖י <WH5321> naf-ta-Li of Naphtali וּמִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> u-mib-be-Nei and of the children זְבֻלֽוּן׃ <WH2074> ze-vu-Lun. of Zebulun

וּמָשַׁכְתִּ֨י <WH4900> u-ma-shach-Ti And I will draw אֵלֶ֜יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha about אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about נַ֣חַל <WH5158> Na-chal unto thee to the river קִישׁ֗וֹן <WH7028> ki-Shon, Kishon אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- סִֽיסְרָא֙ <WH5516> si-se-Ra Sisera שַׂר־ <WH8269> sar- the captain צְבָ֣א <WH6635> tze-Va army יָבִ֔ין <WH2985> ya-Vin, of Jabin's וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et רִכְבּ֖וֹ <WH7393> rich-Bo with his chariots וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הֲמוֹנ֑וֹ <WH1995> ha-mo-No; and his multitude וּנְתַתִּ֖יהוּ <WH5414> u-ne-tat-Ti-hu and I will deliver בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> be-ya-De-cha. him into thine hand

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH413> 'e-Lei-ha then בָּרָ֔ק <WH1301> ba-Rak, And Barak אִם־ <WH518> 'im- to her If תֵּלְכִ֥י <WH1980> te-le-Chi with me then I will go עִמִּ֖י <WH5973> 'im-Mi with וְהָלָ֑כְתִּי <WH1980> ve-ha-La-che-ti; will go וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo you will not תֵלְכִ֛י <WH1980> te-le-Chi go עִמִּ֖י <WH5973> 'im-Mi with לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo I will not אֵלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> 'e-Lech. go

וַתֹּ֜אמֶר <WH559> vat-To-mer And she said הָלֹ֧ךְ <WH1980> ha-Loch I will surely אֵלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> 'e-Lech that thou takest עִמָּ֗ךְ <WH5973> 'im-Mach, thee אֶ֚פֶס <WH657> 'E-fes with thee notwithstanding כִּי֩ <WH3588> ki for לֹ֨א <WH3808> lo not תִֽהְיֶ֜ה <WH1961> tih-Yeh become תִּֽפְאַרְתְּךָ֗ <WH8597> tif-'ar-te-Cha, shall not be for thine honour עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> had-De-rech the journey אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you are about הוֹלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> ho-Lech, to take כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki into בְֽיַד־ <WH3027> ve-yad- into the hand אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah, of a woman יִמְכֹּ֥ר <WH4376> yim-Kor shall sell יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh for the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- סִֽיסְרָ֑א <WH5516> sis-Ra; Sisera וַתָּ֧קָם <WH6965> vat-Ta-kom arose דְּבוֹרָ֛ה <WH1683> de-vo-Rah And Deborah וַתֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> vat-Te-lech and went עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with בָּרָ֖ק <WH1301> ba-Rak with Barak קֶֽדְשָׁה׃ <WH6943> Ked-shah. to Kedesh

וַיַּזְעֵ֨ק <WH2199> vai-yaz-'Ek called בָּרָ֜ק <WH1301> ba-Rak And Barak אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- זְבוּלֻ֤ן <WH2074> ze-vu-Lun Zebulun וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et נַפְתָּלִי֙ <WH5321> naf-ta-Li and Naphtali קֶ֔דְשָׁה <WH6943> Ked-shah, to Kedesh וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> vai-Ya-'al and he went up בְּרַגְלָ֔יו <WH7272> be-rag-Lav, at his feet עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <WH6235> 'a-Se-ret with ten אַלְפֵ֖י <WH505> 'al-Fei thousand אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish; men וַתַּ֥עַל <WH5927> vat-Ta-'al went up עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> im-Mo with דְּבוֹרָֽה׃ <WH1683> de-vo-Rah. and Deborah

וְחֶ֤בֶר <WH2268> ve-Che-ver Now Heber הַקֵּינִי֙ <WH7017> hak-kei-Ni the Kenite נִפְרָ֣ד <WH6504> nif-Rad had severed מִקַּ֔יִן <WH7017> mik-Ka-yin, himself from the Kenites מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> mib-be-Nei [which was] of the children חֹבָ֖ב <WH2246> cho-Vav of Hobab חֹתֵ֣ן <WH2859> cho-Ten the father in law מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh; of Moses וַיֵּ֣ט <WH5186> vai-Yet and pitched אָהֳל֔וֹ <WH168> o-ho-Lo, his tent עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far אֵל֥וֹן <WH436> e-Lon unto the plain; בַּצְעַנִּים batz-'an-nim כבְּצַעֲנַנִּ֖ים <WH6815> be-tza-'a-nan-Nim Zaannannim קאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- is near קֶֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6943> Ke-desh. which [is] by Kedesh

וַיַּגִּ֖דוּ <WH5046> vai-yag-Gi-du And they shewed לְסִֽיסְרָ֑א <WH5516> le-si-se-Ra; Sisera כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for עָלָ֛ה <WH5927> 'a-Lah was gone up בָּרָ֥ק <WH1301> ba-Rak that Barak בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֲבִינֹ֖עַם <WH42> 'a-vi-No-'am of Abinoam הַר־ <WH2022> har- to mount תָּבֽוֹר׃ <WH8396> ta-Vor. Tabor ס sa-Mek

וַיַּזְעֵ֨ק <WH2199> vai-yaz-'Ek gathered together סִֽיסְרָ֜א <WH5516> sis-Ra And Sisera אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all רִכְבּ֗וֹ <WH7393> rich-Bo, all his chariots תְּשַׁ֤ע <WH8672> te-Sha' [even] nine מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> me-'Ot hundred רֶ֣כֶב <WH7393> Re-chev chariots בַּרְזֶ֔ל <WH1270> bar-Zel, of iron וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am and all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> it-To; from מֵחֲרֹ֥שֶׁת <WH2800> me-cha-Ro-shet that [were] with him from Harosheth הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim of the Gentiles אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to נַ֥חַל <WH5158> Na-chal unto the river קִישֽׁוֹן׃ <WH7028> ki-Shon. of Kishon

וַתֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> vat-to-Mer said דְּבֹרָ֨ה <WH1683> de-vo-Rah And Deborah אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בָּרָ֜ק <WH1301> ba-Rak unto Barak ק֗וּם <WH6965> Kum, Up כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki For זֶ֤ה <WH2088> zeh this הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> hai-yOm for this [is] the day אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> na-Tan hath delivered יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh in which the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- סִֽיסְרָא֙ <WH5516> si-se-Ra Sisera בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <WH3027> be-ya-De-cha, into thine hand הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> ha-Lo behold יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh is not the LORD יָצָ֣א <WH3318> ya-Tza gone out לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-cha; before וַיֵּ֤רֶד <WH3381> vai-Ye-red went down בָּרָק֙ <WH1301> ba-Rak thee;So Barak מֵהַ֣ר <WH2022> me-Har from mount תָּב֔וֹר <WH8396> ta-Vor, Tabor וַעֲשֶׂ֧רֶת <WH6235> va-'a-Se-ret and ten אֲלָפִ֛ים <WH505> 'a-la-Fim thousand אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> 'ish men אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rav. after

וַיָּ֣הָם <WH2000> vai-Ya-hom discomfited יְ֠הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- סִֽיסְרָ֨א <WH5516> sis-Ra Sisera וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all הָרֶ֧כֶב <WH7393> ha-Re-chev and all [his] chariots וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֛ה <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Neh and all [his] host לְפִי־ <WH6310> le-fi- with the edge חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> Che-rev of the sword לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before בָרָ֑ק <WH1301> va-Rak; Barak וַיֵּ֧רֶד <WH3381> vai-Ye-red lighted down סִֽיסְרָ֛א <WH5516> sis-Ra so that Sisera מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> me-'Al and הַמֶּרְכָּבָ֖ה <WH4818> ham-mer-ka-Vah off [his] chariot וַיָּ֥נָס <WH5127> vai-Ya-nos and fled away בְּרַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> be-rag-Lav. on his feet

וּבָרָ֗ק <WH1301> u-va-Rak, But Barak רָדַ֞ף <WH7291> ra-Daf pursued אַחֲרֵ֤י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after הָרֶ֙כֶב֙ <WH7393> ha-Re-chev the chariots וְאַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> ve-'a-cha-Rei And הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Neh, and after the host עַ֖ד <WH5704> 'ad far חֲרֹ֣שֶׁת <WH2800> cha-Ro-shet unto Harosheth הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim; of the Gentiles וַיִּפֹּ֞ל <WH5307> vai-yip-Pol fell כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all מַחֲנֵ֤ה <WH4264> ma-cha-Neh and all the host סִֽיסְרָא֙ <WH5516> si-se-Ra of Sisera לְפִי־ <WH6310> le-fi- upon the edge חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> Che-rev, of the sword לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not נִשְׁאַ֖ר <WH7604> nish-'Ar left עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- even אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. [and] there was not a man
